mapper.insert: insert into logic_node(logic_id,logic_code,logic_name,enterprise_id) values (#{logic_id},#{logic_code},#{logic_name},#{enterprise_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE logic_code=#{logic_code},logic_name=#{logic_name},enterprise_id=#{enterprise_id}
mapper.select: select (select `name` from physical where id=physical_id) as physical_name, group_concat(channel_code) as codes from logic_relation where logic_id=#{logic_id} group by physical_id
